name: PersonalRecommendation.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a recommendation resource.

items.name: isGroupRecommendation
items.desc: Whether the recommendation is of group type.

items.name: kind
items.desc: The type of recommendation. Possible values are:music-recommendations: A recommendation for music content.recently-played: A recommendation based on recently played content.unknown: A generic recommendation type.

items.name: nextUpdateDate
items.desc: The next date in UTC format for updating the recommendation.

items.name: reason
items.desc: The localized reason for the recommendation.

items.name: resourceTypes
items.desc: The resource types supported by the recommendation.

items.name: title
items.desc: The localized title for the recommendation.
